lead_paragraph: Four cases that may be the first in the mainland U.S. spread by mosquitoes prompt a request for caution.

headline.print_headline: Two Counties Are Asked to Halt Blood Donations Over Zika
headline.main: F.D.A. Says 2 Florida Counties With Zika Cases Should Suspend Blood Donations

snippet: Four cases that may be the first in the mainland U.S. spread by mosquitoes prompt a request for caution....
abstract: Federal officials call for suspension of blood donations in Miami-Dade and Broward Counties in Florida amid investigations into four Zika virus cases there.
